ARABIC: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We send down in the Qur'an that which is a healing and a mercy to the muminun, but it only increases the wrongdoers in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: What We have sent down of the Qur'an is a healing and a grace for the faithful, and adds only loss for the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What We are sending down in the course of revealing the Qur'an is a healing and a grace for those who have faith; but it adds only to the ruin of the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We reveal the Quran which is a cure and mercy for the believers but does nothing for the unjust except to lead them to perdition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We send down in the Qur’an that which is a cure for the Muslims, and a mercy – and it increases only ruin for the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is a cure and a mercy to the believers, and it increases the wrongdoers in nothing but loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We reveal of the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers, and it adds only to the perdition of the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We send down, of the Koran, that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers; and the unbelievers it increases not, except in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We reveal of the Qur'an that which is a healing and a mercy for believers though it increase the evil-doers in naught save ruin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We send down in the Quran that which is healing and a mercy to those who believe; as for the evil-doers, it only increases their loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We reveal by means of the Qur'an that which is a healing and a mercy unto the believers, and it only increaseth the wrong- doers in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We send down in the Quran that which is a cure and mercy for the faithful; and it increases the wrongdoers only in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We send down (stage by stage) in the Qur'an that which is a healing and a mercy to those who believe: to the unjust it causes nothing but loss after loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We send down from the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to those who believe (in Islamic Monotheism and act on it), and it increases the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers) nothing but loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We sent down of the Koran that which is a healing and a mercy to believers, but to the harmdoers it does not increase them, except in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We send down in the Quran healing and mercy for the believers, but it increases the wrongdoers only in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:82] And We reveal of (min [here] is explicative) the Qur’ān that which is a cure, from error, and a mercy for believers, thereby; though it only increases the evildoers, the disbelievers, in loss, because of their disbelief in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We reveal of the Qur'an) We explain in the Qur'an (that which is a healing) a clarification against blindness; it is also said that this means: a clarification against disbelief, idolatry and hypocrisy (and a mercy) which prevents from chastisement (for believers) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (though it increase the evil-doers) the idolaters; that which is revealed in the Qur'an increases them (in naught save ruin) loss.
